title: User submits form - New Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user is viewing this form - https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/forms/0001553714830890-125dc271ffff978e-0001/settings
And has added themselves as a "Submission Watcher" on the form
And the user "Previews the Form in Site"
And the user checks "Use new pipeline"
custom_steps:
When the user enters "Test" into the First Name field
And the user enters "Form" into the Last Name field
And the user enters their MLB email address into the E-mail Address field
And the user enters "10020" into the Zip Code field
And the user enters a birthday of "1/1/1980" into the Birth Date field
And the user checks the box to opt into Newsletters
And the user checks the box to agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
And the user completed the reCaptcha
And the user submits the form
custom_expected: Then the data entered above will be reflected properly on the submission details page in the Form Tool

title: User Submits Form - Old Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user is filling out this form -
And the user DOES NOT check "Use new pipeline"
custom_steps:
When the user enters text in the Text Input field
And the user selects Option 1 in the Checkbox input
And the user selections Option 2 in the Radio Button input
And the user selects Option 1 in the Dropdown input
And the user enters "test@mlb.com" in the Email input
And the user enters "https://www.mlb.com" in the URL input
And the user enters "1/1/1980" in the Date input
And the user enters "5556667777" in the Phone input
And the user enters "This is a text area" in the Text Area input
And the user completes the reCAPTCHA
And the user submits the form
custom_expected: Then the data entered above will be reflected properly on the submission details page in the Form Tool

title: Compare Old vs. New Submission Details
custom_preconds:
Given we open the Submission Details for the "new" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693325
And we open the Submission Details for the "old" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693326
custom_steps: When we compare the Submission Details of both submissions
custom_expected: Then the Submission Details are identical

title: Compare Old vs. New Submission Object
custom_preconds:
Given we take the "new" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693325
And we perform a GET https://qa-submissions.bam-forms.com/submission/<insertNewSubmissionId>
And we copy the JSON into JSON Diff (http://www.jsondiff.com/)
And we take the "old" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693326
And we perform a GET https://qa-submissions.bam-forms.com/submission/<insertOldSubmissionId>
And we copy the JSON into JSON Diff (http://www.jsondiff.com/)
custom_steps: When we execute the comparison
custom_expected: Then the only differences are "dateConsumed", "dateCreated", "dateUpdated", "pipeline-version", "reCAPTCHA value", "id" (submissionId), and "version"

title: Compare Old vs. New Submission in Reports
custom_preconds: Given we export the submissions from this form -
custom_steps: When we view the data in the reports
custom_expected: Then the reports are identical

title: Check Status of Services and Notifications - New Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user has filled out the form from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16706275
And the user submits the form
custom_steps:
When we check on the status of services and notifications for this submission

GET https://qa-submission-consumer-status.bam-forms.com/consumer-status/<insertSubmissionId>
custom_expected:
Then the status returned will be equal to:

"service": {
        "mobileAlertComplete": true,
        "newsletterComplete": true,
        "fileUploadComplete": true,
        "promoCodeComplete": true,
        "commerceComplete": true,
        "allComplete": true
    },
    "notification": {
        "confirmationEmailComplete": true,
        "submissionNotificationsComplete": true,
        "allComplete": true
    }

title: User submits form - New Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user is viewing this form - 
And has added themselves as a "Submission Watcher" on the form
And the user "Previews the Form in Site"
And the user checks "Use new pipeline"
custom_steps:
When the user enters text in the Text Input field
And the user selects Option 1 in the Checkbox input
And the user selections Option 2 in the Radio Button input
And the user selects Option 1 in the Dropdown input
And the user enters "test@mlb.com" in the Email input
And the user enters "https://www.mlb.com" in the URL input
And the user enters "1/1/1980" in the Date input
And the user enters "5556667777" in the Phone input
And the user enters "This is a text area" in the Text Area input
And the user completes the reCAPTCHA
And the user submits the form
custom_expected: Then the data entered above will be reflected properly on the submission details page in the Form Tool

title: User Submits Form - Old Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user is filling out this form -
And the user DOES NOT check "Use new pipeline"
custom_steps:
When the user enters text in the Text Input field
And the user selects Option 1 in the Checkbox input
And the user selections Option 2 in the Radio Button input
And the user selects Option 1 in the Dropdown input
And the user enters "test@mlb.com" in the Email input
And the user enters "https://www.mlb.com" in the URL input
And the user enters "1/1/1980" in the Date input
And the user enters "5556667777" in the Phone input
And the user enters "This is a text area" in the Text Area input
And the user completes the reCAPTCHA
And the user submits the form
custom_expected: Then the data entered above will be reflected properly on the submission details page in the Form Tool

title: Compare Old vs. New Submission Details
custom_preconds:
Given we open the Submission Details for the "new" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693325
And we open the Submission Details for the "old" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693326
custom_steps: When we compare the Submission Details of both submissions
custom_expected: Then the Submission Details are identical

title: Compare Old vs. New Submission Object
custom_preconds:
Given we take the "new" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693325
And we perform a GET https://qa-submissions.bam-forms.com/submission/<insertNewSubmissionId>
And we copy the JSON into JSON Diff (http://www.jsondiff.com/)
And we take the "old" submission from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16693326
And we perform a GET https://qa-submissions.bam-forms.com/submission/<insertOldSubmissionId>
And we copy the JSON into JSON Diff (http://www.jsondiff.com/)
custom_steps: When we execute the comparison
custom_expected: Then the only differences are "dateConsumed", "dateCreated", "dateUpdated", "pipeline-version", "reCAPTCHA value", "id" (submissionId), and "version"

title: Compare Old vs. New Submission in Reports
custom_preconds: Given we export the submissions from this form -
custom_steps: When we view the data in the reports
custom_expected: Then the reports are identical

title: Check receipt of Submission Alert - New Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user has filled out the form from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16706275
And added themselves as a Submission Watcher on the form
custom_steps: When the user submits the form
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive a Submission Alert email
And the email will contain the correct submissionId
And the email will contain a link that brings the user to that submission

title: Check Status of Services and Notifications - New Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user has filled out the form from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16706275
And the user submits the form
custom_steps:
When we check on the status of services and notifications for this submission

GET https://qa-submission-consumer-status.bam-forms.com/consumer-status/<insertSubmissionId>
custom_expected:
Then the status returned will be equal to:

    "service": {
        "mobileAlertComplete": true,
        "newsletterComplete": true,
        "fileUploadComplete": true,
        "promoCodeComplete": true,
        "commerceComplete": true,
        "allComplete": true
    },
    "notification": {
        "confirmationEmailComplete": true,
        "submissionNotificationsComplete": true,
        "allComplete": true
    }

title: Mobile Alert Received after Opting In - New Pipeline
custom_preconds: Given the user has filled out the form from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16706275
custom_steps: When the user submits the form
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive a text message
And checking the submission (GET https://qa-submissions.bam-forms.com/submission/<enterSubmissionId>) will show "mobileAlertStatus" with a value of "SUCCESS"

title: User Receives Newsletter Email after Opting In - New Pipeline
custom_preconds: Given the user has filled out the form from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16706275
custom_steps: When the user submits the form
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive an email welcoming them to the newsletter
And checking the status of the newsletter (GET https://qa-promo-codes.bam-forms.com/promo-code/promo-code::<insertformId>::<insertpromoCode>) will show "newsletterResult" with a value of "SUCCESS"

title: File Upload present in GCP - New Pipeline
custom_preconds:
Given the user has filled out the form from https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/16706275
And the user submits the form
custom_steps: When an administrator views the GCP bucket provisioned for the property
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to access the file that was uploaded

(Ex. QA uploads go to mlb-bbserv-bff-qa-file-upload-temp)
